info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 01 at 1:54PM CDT by NWS Huntsville
info.description: ...SIGNIFICANT WEATHER ADVISORY FOR CENTRAL JACKSON COUNTY UNTIL 230 PM CDT... At 151 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Scottsboro, moving east at 15 mph. Penny size hail and winds in excess of 40 mph will be possible with this storm. Locations impacted include... Scottsboro, Hollywood, Section, Dutton, Martintown and Larkinsville.
info.instruction: Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike several miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle. If on or near Guntersville Lake or the Tennessee River, get out of the water and move indoors or inside a vehicle. Remember, gusty winds can sink boats. Also, lightning can strike out to 10 miles from the parent thunderstorm. If you can hear thunder, you are close enough to be struck by lightning. Move to safe shelter now! Do not be caught on the water in a thunderstorm.
